standard_dice.description: Standard black dice that are always rolled when making a roll. Each die has 6 faces: 2 Success, 1 Success+Tentacle, 1 Tentacle, 1 Elder Sign, 1 Blank.

bonus_dice.description: Bonus green dice added by skills, cards, or insanity thresholds. There is no limit to the number of bonus dice that may be added to a roll. Each die has 6 faces: 2 Blank, 1 Elder Sign, 2 Success, 1 Elder Sign+Success.

black_dice_faces.description: Success - you succeeded at your attempt
Success + Tentacle - you succeeded but lose 1 sanity
Success - you succeeded at your attempt
Elder Sign - means nothing unless you have a skill or card that uses them

green_dice_faces.description: Elder Sign - means nothing unless you have a skill or card that uses them
Success - you succeeded at your attempt
Success - you succeeded at your attempt
Elder Sign + Success - you succeeded, and elder sign may be used by skills/cards

investigator_rolls.description: When investigators make a roll, you always roll 3 standard black dice (and may also be allowed to add bonus green dice).

enemy_rolls.description: Enemies roll a specific number and type of dice for their attacks, as indicated on their reference card.

red_sanity_marker.description: Reaching certain Insanity Thresholds will add permanent bonus dice to all your rolls. The red swirl symbol indicates when sanity reaches a threshold where powers activate or bonus dice are gained.

tentacle_cost.description: For each tentacle rolled, you lose 1 sanity, moving your tracker 1 space to the right. This applies to EVERY roll - attacking, being attacked, or just making a roll.
